title: Dangerous Curves by Doyald Young
content:
Anyone seen the new Doyald Young book [Dangerous Curves](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516080604/http:/doyaldyoung.com/DC01.html)? Here's a [review over at Typographica.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516080604/http:/typographica.org/001156.php)

I have one of his books and it is amazing. This one I might have to save a bit for it at $100 plus shipping!
author: jayyy

comments.content: It is incredible. I own all of his books and find them very useful, esp Fonts and Logos although all of them are great. I really like Dangerous Curves because it is pretty much all sketches of his custom logo work. I love seeing his process and his sketches, his work is amazing. He attends the Y Conference down here in San Diego fairly frequently, if you can make it out he is a fascinating person to speak with and will even sign your book.

Doyald's new book, Dangerous Curves, is spectacular. He gave a talk here in NYC at the Harvard Club a few weeks ago and it was a wonderful evening. I feel honored that Doyald asked me to contribute an essay to the book.

James
Doyald is going to be a featured speaker at TypeCon this year, and I can't wait to hear his talk. He'll also do a book signing for Dangerous Curves - I already have my signed copy reserved.
